message: Welcome to Salesforce Global Support! Are you a new Salesforce user or an existing user?
Welcome! Here are some common topics for new users:

options.label: How do I access Salesforce for the first time?
About my user profile and settings

message: To access Salesforce, use the login link sent to your email. Your username is typically your work email. If you don't have login credentials, please contact your Salesforce admin.

options.label: How do I reset my first-time password?

message: Once logged in, you'll see the Salesforce Home page. Use the App Launcher (grid icon) to switch between apps. Main navigation is on the top. Click 'Opportunities', 'Leads', 'Contacts', etc. to explore records.

options.label: Show me a Salesforce walkthrough video

message: Salesforce Trailhead is the best place to learn. Visit trailhead.salesforce.com and log in with your Salesforce account. Start with 'Salesforce Platform Basics'.
To view or edit your profile, click your avatar at the top right and choose 'Settings'. Here you can update personal details, change your password, and set preferences.
On the login page, click 'Forgot Your Password?'. Enter your username/email. Follow the email instructions to set a new password.
Here's a helpful Salesforce walkthrough video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lfvx1rZzJfE (copy-paste into your browser).
Trailhead: https://trailhead.salesforce.com/en/home (copy-paste into your browser).
How can I help you today?
Login & Access help:
On the login page, click 'Forgot Your Password?'. Enter your username/email, and check your email for reset instructions.
If you're locked out, contact your Salesforce administrator or support team to unlock your account.
To enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), go to 'Settings' > 'Advanced User Details' and follow MFA setup. Use Salesforce Authenticator app or your phone for codes.
If you can't see your records, check with your admin about your profile permissions or sharing rules.
User management options:
Go to 'Setup' > 'Users' > 'New User', fill in user details, and save. The new user will receive an email invitation.
To deactivate a user, go to 'Setup' > 'Users', click the user name, and select 'Deactivate'. You cannot delete users, only deactivate.
Go to 'Setup' > 'Users', select the user, and click 'Reset Password'.
To assign or modify roles, go to 'Setup' > 'Users', select the user, and change their Profile or Role as needed.
Data import/export options:
Use 'Data Import Wizard' in Setup to upload your CSV file. Follow on-screen instructions to map fields.
To export data, use 'Data Export' in Setup for all data, or run a Report and click 'Export' for reports.
For mass update, use 'Data Loader' (desktop app) or list view inline editing for smaller updates.
Customization options:
Go to 'Setup' > 'Object Manager', select an object, and add/edit fields under 'Fields & Relationships'.
In 'Setup' > 'Object Manager', pick the object, then go to 'Page Layouts' to customize field arrangement.
To create a new object, go to 'Setup' > 'Object Manager' > 'Create', and follow the steps for a custom object.
Reporting & Dashboards:
Go to the 'Reports' tab, click 'New Report', select a report type, and drag/drop fields. Save and run your report.
Click 'Dashboards', 'New Dashboard', add components (charts, tables) using your saved reports.
Open your report or dashboard, click 'Share', and choose users or public groups to share with.
Process Automation options:
Use 'Flow Builder' in Setup to create automations, or 'Process Builder' for simpler automation needs.
In 'Setup', search for 'Approval Processes', and follow the wizard to define criteria and steps.
Create Email Alerts in Workflow Rules or Flows to send automated emails based on triggers.
Integration options:

options.label: Connect to third-party apps (Slack, DocuSign, etc)

message: Install 'Salesforce for Outlook' from Setup. Follow the instructions to connect and sync your email/calendar.
Salesforce supports REST and SOAP APIs for integration. Get your security token from 'Settings' > 'Reset My Security Token'.
For apps like Slack or DocuSign, search AppExchange and follow the install/configure steps for your integration.
Troubleshooting options:

options.label: I get an error when saving a record
I can't find an object or field

message: Check for required fields or validation rules on the record. If error persists, note the message and contact your admin or support.
You may not have permission to see this object/field. Contact your admin to verify your profile permissions.
Try clearing your browser cache or switching browsers. Check trust.salesforce.com for known issues.
Please type your question or describe your issue. Or, type 'agent' at any time to connect with a human support representative.
